name: a cat
shortDescription: A cat is here, being annoying.
longDescription: The cat seems to be happy, even if it doesn't do much.

name: the postmaster
shortDescription: The head postmaster is standing here, waiting to help you with your mail.
longDescription:
The Postmaster seems like a happy old man, though a bit sluggish.  He
worries about the reputation of the UMS (Universal Mail Service), as many
people seem to think that it is slow.  Perhaps if he were to brush the
cobwebs from his uniform it would help to make a better impression.

name: Fat Sal
shortDescription: Fat Sal is here, making everyone fat with his food.
longDescription: Fat Sal is a big man with a big belly.  He's run the deli for as long as it's been here.  He loves to get his customers fat on his food.
